modules.sql: WITH txn_stats AS (SELECT txn_type, as_of, amount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY txn_type, as_of ORDER BY transaction_id) AS rn, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY txn_type, as_of) AS type_count FROM transactions) SELECT txn_type, as_of, ROUND(SUM(amount), 2) AS total_amount, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count, ROUND(AVG(amount), 2) AS avg_amount FROM txn_stats GROUP BY txn_type, as_of ORDER BY as_of, txn_type
